name: CompileThis
description:
Latest Version: BETA-1.0 Developer: XyloGames Estimated release date: 01.09.2021

This puzzle game is all about Compiling 3 Programs.

The first one war was written in Python, the second in Java, and the last one is in C#. Each Program has 5 Levels, where you have to find the correct solution. In the Current release (Version 1.0.0) there are already five levels for the Python Program and one for the Java Program. C# is coming soon.

Development

The game is being developed by one person (13) in Unity 2021.1.9f1. It will become open Sourced as soon as the game is liked by most players.

Support

There is no way to donate money yet, but you already support me by playing the game and recommending it to your friends. Thank you.

Easter eggs

There will be several Easter eggs spread all over the Game. In the early versions, there most likely won't be many of them, but there are already more than you think.
